<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Physics and Music</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik und Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique et musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física e música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica e musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική και μουσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física y música</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation with sound which shows the physical aspects of the musical sounds produced by a piano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation mit Ton, der die körperlichen 
Aspekte der musikalischen Töne zeigt, produzierte durch ein Klavier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation avec le bruit qui montre les 
aspects physiques des bruits musicaux a produit par un piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation com som que mostra os aspectos 
físicos dos sons musicais produziu por um piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione con il suono che mostra le 
funzioni fisiche dei suoni musicali ha prodotto da un piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα με τον ήχο που εμφανίζει φυσικές 
πτυχές των μουσικών ήχων που παράγονται από ένα πιάνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación con el sonido que muestra los 
aspectos físicos de los sonidos musicales produjo por un piano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">suono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">música</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
